text: CalephoriniYin XC (1982) On the taxonomic system of Acridoidea from China. Acta Biologica Plateau Sinica, 1(1), pages 100 is a tribe of insects in the subfamily Acridinae, the silent slant-faced grasshoppers. == References == == External links == * Category:Acrididae Category:Orthoptera tribes
title: Calephorini
